title: Category Config
description: Configuration for the repository categories GitHub action config.json file.

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: Path to the schema against which this document should be validated.

onlyPublicRepositories.title: Only Public Repositories
onlyPublicRepositories.description:
Query only public repositories. Private repositories will be ignored.
Default: true

templateFiles.title: Template Files
templateFiles.description: Template files to use for the categories.

readme.title: README
readme.description:
Template file for the readme.
Default: './.github/categories/templates/readme.md'

category.title: Category
category.description:
Template file for the category.
Default: './.github/categories/templates/category.md'

repository.title: Repository
repository.description:
Template file for the repository.
Default: './.github/categories/templates/repository.md'

labelSearchPattern.title: Label Search Pattern
labelSearchPattern.description:
The category regex search pattern to use when searching for category labels in the repositories. Specify the categories as comma separated values in the label description.
Default: '/category/g'

repositoryBlacklist.title: Repository Blacklist
repositoryBlacklist.description:
List of repository names to blacklist.
Default: ['.github']

categories.title: Categories
categories.description:
Mappings between the category IDs and the category names.
Default: {"": "No Category"}

properties.description: Default category to use if no category is found.

patternProperties.description: Mapping from the category ID to the category name.
